headline: UIndy at #1 Purdue Exhibition Primer
summary: Purdue will finish out its two game exhibition schedule by returning to Mackey Arena to host D2 UIndy on Wednesday at 7:00 p.m.. But while Purdue moves onto its final exhibition tune up before the season starts in earnest next week, this week’s game is still more about the reactions to last week’s 78-65 loss […]

headline: Edwards, Santa Cruz Earn Final Big Ten Weekly Awards
summary: For the second time this season, two Purdue student-athletes have been named to Big Ten Weekly honors. Purdue’s Emily Edwards was named Goalkeeper of the Week, while Megan Santa Cruz was named Offensive Player of the Week.

summary: Purdue, Florida and Duke round out the top line as tipoff to the 2025-26 season nears.

Smith, Kaufman-Renn Tabbed to CBS Sports All-America Teams
summary: CBS Sports has selected Braden Smith as its preseason National Player of the Year, while Trey Kaufman-Renn joined him on the preseason All-American first team, the organization announced Tuesday.

headline: Smith Named Preseason All-American by the Associated Press
summary: Associated Press (AP) voters have selected Braden Smith as a unanimous selection to its preseason All-American team, the organization announced Monday afternoon.
